channel.title: Server computers question
channel.description:
how do you use them? do they need a separate internet connection? can i control it from my main computer?
Overall i know nothing about them, but i want one for my server
EDIT: How do they connect to my mopar files and run the server?

item.title: Server computers question
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

if u buy a server computer u will host it on your internet wasting your own money.
if you rent it you will use whatever internet they are using u get access to your server from windows 2003 remote thing u see the whole desktop.

Read full topic

item.title: Server computers question

item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

for a website?

EDIT: Oh you mean for a dedicated host.
I think you upload your server zip file there, and extract it, then you have like remote access to the computer, and you get to click run.bat and stuff. Iâ€™m not 100% positive though.
